au_932694: bash-4.3$ shopt -s globstar ;
bash-4.3$ known_sha1sum="4b1e65aab01f76b8863707eda5215af09633d275"
bash-4.3$ for f in ./**/* ; do [ -f "$f" ] && shasum=$(sha1sum "$f" | awk '{print $1}'); [ "$shasum" = "$known_sha1sum" ] && echo "$f"; done
